Phir Hera Pheri is the sequel to Hera Pheri, which falls under the Hera Pheri franchise.
Both Hera Pheri and Phir Hera Pheri are Indian Hindi-language comedy films that fall under the Hera Pheri franchise.
Phir Hera Pheri was released in 2006.
Phir Hera Pheri became a major commercial success after its release in 2006.

node_2: raju, ghanshyam alias shyam, and baburao ganpatrao apte (fondly called as babu bhaiya)
edge: The trio of Raju, Ghanshyam alias Shyam, and Baburao Ganpatrao Apte (fondly called as Babu Bhaiya) from Hera Pheri became rich and rolling in money.
The story of Phir Hera Pheri revolves around what happens after the wealth of the trio from the Hera Pheri franchise.
The Phir Hera Pheri trio gets cheated by Anuradha in the film.
The Phir Hera Pheri trio has to repay their debt owed to Tiwari in the film.
Akshay Kumar starred in Phir Hera Pheri.
Suniel Shetty starred in Phir Hera Pheri.
Paresh Rawal starred in Phir Hera Pheri and reprised his role from the previous film.
Bipasha Basu starred in Phir Hera Pheri as Anuradha.
Rimi Sen also appeared in Phir Hera Pheri.
Sharat Saxena played the role of Tiwari in the film.
Rajpal Yadav appeared in Phir Hera Pheri.

Babu Bhaiya and his siblings have become wealthy due to unknown circumstances.
Shyam lost his only love Anuradha Shivshanker Panikar in an accident.
Raju hears about a scheme from a con woman named Anuradha and convinces his friends to join in.
Babu Bhaiya has lost the little traces of common sense that he possessed.

node_2: idea for doubling wealth in 21 days
edge: Anuradha claims to have an idea for doubling wealth in 21 days, which she convinces Raju, Shyam, and Babu Bhaiya to join.
Raju arranges for the necessary funds from Shyam and Babu Bhaiya for Anuradha's scheme.
Babu Bhaiya sells their bungalow to arrange the last bit of money needed for Anuradha's scheme.
Pappu contributes a portion of the money needed for Anuradha's scheme.
Raju sells off their bungalow to arrange the last bit of money needed for Anuradha's scheme.
The trio does not even have possession of their bungalow, which Raju had sold off to arrange the last bit of money needed.

Shyam, Babu Bhaiya have three days to come up with ₹40 lakh to pay back the goon or else they will themselves be killed by Tiwari.
Munna Bhai is plotting to steal drugs from Nanji Bhai.
Raju overhears Munna Bhai plotting to steal drugs from Nanji Bhai and assumes they are talking about stealing money.
Shyam, Babu Bhaiya now have three days to come up with ₹40 lakh to pay back the goon or else they will themselves be killed.
The three (Shyam, Babu Bhaiya, and Raju) manage to succeed barely but are confused when they do not find money inside.
Raju recognizes stuff like drugs and tells them that they are worth at least ₹3 crores (thirty million).
The three (Shyam, Babu Bhaiya, and Raju) think that if they can sell the drugs to Kachra Seth and pay off Tiwari, they can also become rich.
Anuradha tells them that the entire scam was hatched by Kabira and his close aide Chhota Chetan to get revenge on the trio.
Anuradha's sister was Kabira's gang member and part of the first film's kidnapping plot.
Their money was converted to diamonds to pay the ransom, but she fled with them once she discovered her niece had escaped and hid them under a decoration of a circus train (named 'Kook-Doo-Koo').

Firoz Nadiadwala announced plans for the sequel of Hera Pheri, titled Hera Pheri 3.
Indra Kumar has been confirmed as the director of Hera Pheri 3.
Akshay Kumar will be reprising his role in Hera Pheri 3.
Sunil Shetty will also return to play his character in the sequel of Hera Pheri.
Paresh Rawal will be seen again in his iconic role in the upcoming sequel of Hera Pheri.
The first two installments of Hera Pheri were huge box office successes, and the third one is expected to follow suit.
The film will continue with the hilarious comedy genre that made the first two movies so popular.
The film Hera Pheri 3 features Akshay Kumar in the lead role, as confirmed by Kumar himself to The Indian Express.
The film Hera Pheri 3 features Sunil Shetty in the lead role, as it is a part of the same team as the previous two movies.
The film Hera Pheri 3 features Paresh Rawal in the lead role, as it is a part of the same team as the previous two movies.
